cast.name: 汤姆·罗森塔尔 Tom Rosenthal
杰米·福雷特斯 Jamie Flatters

writer.name: 汤姆·罗森塔尔 Tom Rosenthal

introduction: Tom is an emotionally arrested control freak, desperately trying to impress his new neighbour Sophie and invariably making a mess of it. His flatmate Naz is an intrepid eccentric: in his own mind, a polymath of unparalleled genius. In reality, he’s an idiot.Together, these two manchildren present their life in the flat as a fun-packed TV schedule, with each farcical incident playing out in the form of well known shows.In I’m Not a Celebrity ... Get Me Back In My Flat!, Naz must root through a dumpster full of bin juice to find his missing keys. In the Big Flat Diary Room, Tom and Naz tear strips off each other as they fight over the flat’s feng shui. And in an exclusive interview for Flat News, Naz proudly presents his Dragon’s Deninvention – the Swiss Army Hat, which is basically just a cap with cutlery fastened to it.Each episode sees many more hit programmes sent up, as Tom and Naz blunder their way from one domestic mishap to the next. These are relatable stories of everyday existence, brilliantly reimagined as popular entertainment formats. A fresh and distinctive comedy for the next generation, Flat TV is the classic sitcom as you’ve never seen it before.
